description:
Ryo flirts with and probably protects Shoko, a popular young woman who charges her would-be suitors for everything.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai wa Okane o Koeru ka? Mokkori Tai Choukin Musume
L`amour est plus fort que l`argent
Love can be superior to money? Mokkori vs saving girl
愛はお金を越えるか? モッコリ対貯金娘
